name: UpdateCaseStatus
description:
Update the status of a specific case in Datadog.

Use this tool to change the status of an existing case in Datadog. It should be called when you need to update a case's progress or condition to a new state.

parameters.name: case_uuid_or_key
parameters.description: The unique identifier or key for the case to update its status in Datadog.

parameters.name: case_status
parameters.description: Specify the status of the case. Valid values are 'OPEN', 'IN_PROGRESS', 'CLOSED'.

parameters.name: case_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type of the case. Must be 'case'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
